title: Four Tiles, late 16th century
creditline: Gift of A. Algara R. de Terreros
description: Moulded in low relief, with white, blue, green and brown glazed, forming an octagonal motif, with conventionalized floral and foliate forms.

tombstone.epitaph:
Four Tiles, late 16th century.
late 16th century. Glazed moulded earthenware. Gift of A. Algara R. de Terreros. 1935-16-1-a/d.
